INVENTORY_ALREADY_EXISTS: Inventory already exists for this product
INVENTORY_EXCEEDS_PRODUCT_STOCK: Total inventory quantity exceeds product stock quantity
INVENTORY_NOT_OWNED_BY_SELLER: You don't have permission to access this inventory
PRODUCT_NOT_OWNED_BY_SELLER: You don't have permission to access this product
INVALID_SIZE: Size {size} is not available for this product
INVALID_COLOR: Color {color} is not available for this product
